column1: Smoque BBQ////The MOST enjoyable part of coming here
column3: was the service! Everyone was very well conducted. They were always checking how the food was
column4: etc. etc. And because of the atmosphere
column5: even when the place was fully packed
column6: the customers remained in good spirits as well. I'd ordered
column8: and we were getting ready to leave when I wanted to get some to go. One of the staff saw it was my second time in line and saw the rest of my party had left
column9: so he rushed my order and got me out of there quick. It was a great trip experience (if you discount the issue of rush hour Chicago traffic
